name: Double Pass
description:
Game made for the trijam in 3 hours. The theme is don't drop it. 

Controls :

  • Right / Left arrows for move
  • Z for jump
  • Press any key for start and replay the game

Have fun !!

Assets :

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/pixel-platformer

Music :
